mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.credit_code AS "creditCode", a.regi_num AS "regiNum", a.org_name AS "orgName", a.regi_place_num AS "regiPlaceNum", a.legal_repr_name AS "legalReprName", a.place AS "place", a.appr_date AS "apprDate", a.org_type AS "orgType", a.type AS "type", a.prin_code AS "prinCode", a.prin_id AS "prinId", a.prin_name AS "prinName", a.prin_tel AS "prinTel", a.work_add AS "workAdd", a.secu_name AS "secuName", a.secu_tel AS "secuTel", a.concern_extent AS "concernExtent", a.esta_org_cond AS "estaOrgCond", a.esta_org AS "estaOrg", a.party_mem AS "partyMem", a.labor_union AS "laborUnion", a.labor_union_num AS "laborUnionNum", a.youth_leag_org AS "youthLeagOrg", a.youth_leag_org_num AS "youthLeagOrgNum", a.women_org AS "womenOrg", a.women_num AS "womenNum", a.capi_sour AS "capiSour", a.over_back AS "overBack", a.area_map AS "areaMap", a.area_point AS "areaPoint", a.icon AS "icon", a.images AS "images", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", (case a.concern_extent when 01 then '高' when 02 then '中' when 03 then '低' else '' end) "concExteLable"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ccm_org_socialorg( id, credit_code, regi_num, org_name, regi_place_num, legal_repr_name, place, appr_date, org_type, type, prin_code, prin_id, prin_name, prin_tel, work_add, secu_name, secu_tel, concern_extent, esta_org_cond, esta_org, party_mem, labor_union, labor_union_num, youth_leag_org, youth_leag_org_num, women_org, women_num, capi_sour, over_back, area_map, area_point, icon, images, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{creditCode}, #{regiNum}, #{orgName}, #{regiPlaceNum}, #{legalReprName}, #{place}, #{apprDate}, #{orgType}, #{type}, #{prinCode}, #{prinId}, #{prinName}, #{prinTel}, #{workAdd}, #{secuName}, #{secuTel}, #{concernExtent}, #{estaOrgCond}, #{estaOrg}, #{partyMem}, #{laborUnion}, #{laborUnionNum}, #{youthLeagOrg}, #{youthLeagOrgNum}, #{womenOrg}, #{womenNum}, #{capiSour}, #{overBack}, #{areaMap}, #{areaPoint}, #{icon}, #{images}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ccm_org_socialorg SET credit_code = #{creditCode}, regi_num = #{regiNum}, org_name = #{orgName}, regi_place_num = #{regiPlaceNum}, legal_repr_name = #{legalReprName}, place = #{place}, appr_date = #{apprDate}, org_type = #{orgType}, type = #{type}, prin_code = #{prinCode}, prin_id = #{prinId}, prin_name = #{prinName}, prin_tel = #{prinTel}, work_add = #{workAdd}, secu_name = #{secuName}, secu_tel = #{secuTel}, concern_extent = #{concernExtent}, esta_org_cond = #{estaOrgCond}, esta_org = #{estaOrg}, party_mem = #{partyMem}, labor_union = #{laborUnion}, labor_union_num = #{laborUnionNum}, youth_leag_org = #{youthLeagOrg}, youth_leag_org_num = #{youthLeagOrgNum}, women_org = #{womenOrg}, women_num = #{womenNum}, capi_sour = #{capiSour}, over_back = #{overBack}, area_map = #{areaMap}, area_point = #{areaPoint}, icon = #{icon}, images = #{images}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
